languages.text: "Это не суд, а фарс. Виновные давно скрылись, пока она давила трущобных крыс".
languages.translation_comment:
After arriving on Footfall in Chapter 4 and seeing Chorda's trial (but before the RT decides what to do with the station).
Jae: "Poor Footfall... Whatever Chorda tells herself, what she has done to the station cannot be pleasing to the Exalted One!"

traits.locale_text: "Это не суд, а фарс. Виновные давно скрылись, пока она давила трущобных крыс".

languages.text: "It's not a court, it's a farce. The guilty escaped while she was busy crushing slum rats."
languages.translation_comment:
After arriving on Footfall in Chapter 4 and seeing Chorda's trial (but before the RT decides what to do with the station).
Jae: "Poor Footfall... Whatever Chorda tells herself, what she has done to the station cannot be pleasing to the Exalted One!"
languages.original_text: "Это не суд, а фарс. Виновные давно скрылись, пока она давила трущобных крыс".

traits.locale_text: "It's not a trial, it's a farce. The culprits escaped while she was busy crushing slum rats."
"It's not a trial, it's a farce. The culprits escaped while she was busy crushing slum rats."
"It's not a court, it's a farce. The guilty escaped while she was busy crushing slum rats."
"It's not a court, it's a farce. The guilty escaped while she was busy crushing slum rats."
"It's not a court, it's a farce. The guilty escaped while she was busy crushing slum rats."
"It's not a court, it's a farce. The guilty escaped while she was busy crushing slum rats."

languages.text: 「あれは法廷などではない。茶番だ。彼女がスラムのネズミどもを潰している間に、本当に罪がある者は逃亡した」
languages.original_text: "It's not a court, it's a farce. The guilty escaped while she was busy crushing slum rats."

traits.locale_text: 「あれは法廷などではない。茶番だ。彼女がスラムのネズミどもを潰している間に、本当に罪がある者は逃亡した」

languages.text: "Das ist kein Gericht, es ist eine Farce. Die Schuldigen sind entkommen, während sie damit beschäftigt war, Slum-Ratten zu zerquetschen."
languages.original_text: "It's not a court, it's a farce. The guilty escaped while she was busy crushing slum rats."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist kein Gericht, es ist eine Farce. Die Schuldigen sind entkommen, während sie damit beschäftigt war, Slum-Ratten zu zerquetschen."

languages.text: « Ce n'est pas un tribunal, mais une mascarade. Les coupables ont pris la fuite pendant qu'elle était occupée à écraser des rats dans les taudis. »
languages.original_text: "It's not a court, it's a farce. The guilty escaped while she was busy crushing slum rats."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est pas un tribunal, mais une mascarade. Les coupables ont pris la fuite pendant qu'elle était occupée à écraser des rats dans les taudis. »

languages.text: «Esto no es un tribunal, es una farsa. Los culpables escaparon mientras ella estaba ocupada aplastando ratas callejeras».
languages.original_text: "It's not a court, it's a farce. The guilty escaped while she was busy crushing slum rats."

traits.locale_text: «Esto no es un tribunal, es una farsa. Los culpables escaparon mientras ella estaba ocupada aplastando ratas callejeras».

languages.text: “这根本不是什么法庭，而是一场闹剧。当她忙着碾死贫民窟的老鼠时，真正的罪犯却逃走了。”
languages.original_text: "It's not a court, it's a farce. The guilty escaped while she was busy crushing slum rats."

traits.locale_text: “这根本不是什么法庭，而是一场闹剧。当她忙着碾死贫民窟的老鼠时，真正的罪犯却逃走了。”

languages.text: "Mahkeme değil bu, bildiğin kepazelik. O, sıçanlarla uğraşırken asıl suçlular kaçmış."
languages.original_text: "It's not a court, it's a farce. The guilty escaped while she was busy crushing slum rats."

traits.locale_text: "Bu duruşma filan değil, kepazelik. O, sıçanlarla uğraşırken asıl suçlular kaçmış."

languages.original_text: "It's not a court, it's a farce. The guilty escaped while she was busy crushing slum rats."
